channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Building Jetflow: a framework for flexible, performant data pipelines at Cloudflare】构建Jetflow：Cloudflare的灵活高效数据流水线框架
item.description: 【 Faced with a data-ingestion challenge at a massive scale, Cloudflare's Business Intelligence team built a new framework called Jetflow. 】面对大规模的数据摄入挑战，Cloudflare 的商业智能团队构建了一个名为 Jetflow 的新框架。

item.title: 【Shutdown season: the Q2 2025 Internet disruption summary】停机季节：2025年第二季度互联网中断总结
item.description: 【 In Q2 2025, we observed Internet disruptions around the world resulting from government-directed shutdowns, power outages, cable damage, a cyberattack, and technical problems. 】在2025年第二季度，我们观察到由于政府指导的断网、停电、电缆损坏、网络攻击和技术问题，全球出现了互联网中断的情况。

item.title: 【Explore your Cloudflare data with Python notebooks, powered by marimo】使用 Python 笔记本探索您的 Cloudflare 数据，由 marimo 驱动
item.description: 【 We’ve partnered with marimo to bring their best-in-class Python notebook experience to your Cloudflare data. 】我们已与 marimo 合作，将他们一流的 Python 笔记本体验带入您的 Cloudflare 数据中。

item.title: 【The White House AI Action Plan: a new chapter in U.S. AI policy】美国白宫人工智能行动方案：美国人工智能政策的新篇章
item.description: 【 The White House AI Action Plan is a pivotal policy document outlining the current administration's priorities and deliverables in AI to establish American AI as the gold standard for AI worldwide. 】白宫人工智能行动方案是一项关键的政策文件，概述了现任政府在人工智能领域的优先事项和成果，以确立美国人工智能作为全球人工智能的黄金标准。

item.title: 【Quicksilver v2: evolution of a globally distributed key-value store (Part 2)】闪电侠v2：全球分布式键值存储的演进（第2部分）
item.description: 【 This is part two of a story about how we overcame the challenges of making a complex system more scalable. 】这是关于如何克服使复杂系统更具可扩展性挑战的故事的第二部分。

item.title: 【Cloudflare recognized as a Visionary in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms】Cloudflare 在 2025 年 Gartner® 魔法象限™ SASE 平台中被列为愿景者
item.description: 【 Gartner has recognized Cloudflare as a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms report. 】Gartner将Cloudflare认可为2025年Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ SASE平台报告中的愿景者。

item.title: 【Cloudflare protects against critical SharePoint vulnerability, CVE-2025-53770】Cloudflare 保护免受关键 SharePoint 漏洞 CVE-2025-53770 的影响
item.description: 【 Microsoft disclosed two critical vulnerabilities, CVE-2025-53771 and CVE-2025-53770, that are exploited to attack SharePoint servers. 】微软披露了两个关键漏洞CVE-2025-53771和CVE-2025-53770，这些漏洞被用于攻击SharePoint服务器。

item.title: 【Cloudflare 1.1.1.1 incident on July 14, 2025】2025年7月14日Cloudflare 1.1.1.1事件
item.description: 【 July 14th, 2025, Cloudflare made a change to our service topologies that caused an outage for 1.1.1.1 on the edge, causing downtime for 62 minutes for customers using the 1.1.1.1 public DNS Resolver. 】2025年7月14日，Cloudflare对其服务拓扑进行了更改，导致边缘上的1.1.1.1出现中断，使用1.1.1.1公共DNS解析器的客户因此出现了62分钟的停机时间。

item.title: 【Serverless Statusphere: a walk through building serverless ATProto applications on Cloudflare’s Developer Platform】无服务器状态球：在Cloudflare开发者平台上构建无服务器ATProto应用的全过程
item.description: 【 Build and deploy real-time, decentralized Authenticated Transfer Protocol (ATProto) apps on Cloudflare Workers. 】在Cloudflare Workers上构建和部署实时的、去中心化的认证传输协议（ATProto）应用。

item.title: 【Vulnerability disclosure on SSL for SaaS v1 (Managed CNAME)】SSL 用于 SaaS v1 的漏洞披露（托管 CNAME）
item.description: 【 An upcoming vulnerability disclosure in Cloudflare’s SSL for SaaSv1 is detailed, explaining the steps we’ve taken towards deprecation. 】Cloudflare 的 SaaSv1 SSL 中的一个即将披露的漏洞已被详细说明，并解释了我们为弃用该功能所采取的步骤。
